resources.string: To Exit the app hold 2 fingers on the touchpad area for 1 second or more to go HOME

Some of the basic gestures are: 
 - One Finger Tap = Wakeup device / Select 
 - One Finger Swipe Up = Previous row(go up) with soft-keyboard 
 - One Finger Swipe Down = Next row(go down) with soft-keyboard 
 - One Finger Hold = Bring up menu(when available) 
 - Two Finger Swipe Back = Delete / Backspace in keyboard only 
 - Two Finger Swipe Forward = Delete action on notifications and camera apps 
 	 Add space with soft-keyboard up only 
 - Two Finger Swipe Up = Volume up 
 - Two Finger Swipe Down = Volume down 
 - Two Finger Hold = HOME 
 - Three Finger Tap = Screen OFF 
 - Three Finger Hold = Assistant Activation
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
